metadata.synopsis: Three people are nerding out about the Steel Watchers. They have an unofficial fanclub in which they meet to discuss them - one was just thrown by a Watcher (for climbing up on it), and they're all jealous. This is the elf's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 3; 49; 133- To the elf nerd

0.speaker: Trinigan Gazotts
0.text: What I wouldn't give to see how those things are made - finest engineering this side of the Chionthar.

1.speaker: Trinigan Gazotts
1.text: My mate got thrown by a Steel Watcher - lucky bugger. The trajectory was perfection.
